objects.description: Following the successful injection of [SUNBURST](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0559), [SUNSPOT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0562) deleted a temporary file it created named InventoryManager.bk after restoring the original SolarWinds Orion source code to the software library.(Citation: CrowdStrike SUNSPOT Implant January 2021)

external_references.description: CrowdStrike Intelligence Team. (2021, January 11). SUNSPOT: An Implant in the Build Process. Retrieved January 11, 2021.
